title: Teacher Capacity-Building Training Program Using Inquiry-Based Astronomy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Astronomy Concepts and Understanding of Fundamental Science Education Methodologies
context.additional_context: Targets corporate social education managers, aiming to strengthen interdisciplinary education design competencies using astronomy as a medium. Emphasizes practical strategies to overcome system access barriers.

learning_goals: Participants can design astronomy-based inquiry learning modules integrated with three or more interdisciplinary themes (e.g., physics, mathematics, environmental science)
Participants can implement inquiry-based instructional models in real-time online environments and submit improved lesson plans incorporating peer feedback
Participants can develop project-based assessment tools (including rubrics) to expand accessibility in science education and apply them to actual educational contexts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
